articles.title: Ecuadorian prison clash leaves at least 52 dead: police - Fox News
articles.description: Clashes inside Ecuador's largest prison early Saturday left at least 52 inmates dead in the latest violence to hit the Litoral Penitentiary, which recently saw what authorities said was the country's worst ever prison bloodbath.

articles.title: Fire marshals arrest suspect for allegedly hurling Molotov cocktails into Brooklyn deli
